item.title: Apple Restricts Employee Use of ChatGPT, Wary of Leaks
item.description: Apple Restricts Employee Use of ChatGPT Apple has restricted employee use of ChatGPT, a large language model developed by OpenAI. The restriction is reportedly due to Apple’s concern that employees could use ChatGPT to release confidential data as the company develops its own similar technology.
